name: TowerDefense
description:
A small classic TowerDefense game with modern design with 15 levels featuring 30+ types of enemies. Every 50 kills will be awarded with $500. The game is the author's first attempt at making a computer game and is extended from a tutorial series at www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys.

The game was initially intended to share with friends and family. Now I would love to make it even more enjoyable with your feedback and suggestion to extend/change/re-balance the game, e.g. camera shakes. This is a small project that I did in one week so there is a lot of room for improvement.
